name: The power of the Han wanes
lore: The empire, long divided, must unite; long united, must divide
effects: Begin the game with this event

name: Zhang Jue's Yellow Typhoon
lore: The heavenly commander uses his magic against the Han Empire
eventCards: Zhang Jue and Huangfu Song enter play
effects: Contest for Military. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: In the Peach Garden
lore: We dare not hope to be together always but hereby vow to die on the same day
eventCards: Zhang Fei and Guan Yu enter play
effects: Players can only use up to 3 cards for their purchases

name: Imperial Inspection
lore: The imperial court decreed officials who have their posts given due to military service should not retain them
effects: Contest for Influence. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: A coalition is formed
lore: Cao Cao brings together the lords and they appoint Yuan Shao as their commander
effects: Contest for Unique Allegiances. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: Empress Dong is poisoned
lore: He Jin schemes to have the empress poisoned
effects: Players play 1 less card this turn

name: Dong Zhuo stumbles across the Emperor
lore: Dong Zhuo finds the emperor and his brother and takes them under his wing
effects: Remove from play the bottom 2 available heroes without replacement this turn

name: Tempted by Red, Gold and Pearls
lore: Lu Bu kills Ding Yuan and joins Dong Zhuo
effects: Contest for Rebels + Dong Zhuo heroes. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: An unexpected gift: the jeweled knife
lore: Cao Cao tries to assassinate Dong Zhuo but is unsuccessful, losing his gift in the process
effects: Players must start the turn with 3 cards in Wei, either from this or previous turns

name: Betray the world before it betrays you
lore: Cao Cao accidentally cuts down a farmer's family...and then the farmer himself
effects: Players must return a card from the field to their hand immediately. Discard down to 5 cards if necessary

name: Dong Zhuo razes Luoyang to the ground
lore: Dong Zhuo moves the capital to Chang'an and leaves a trail of fire behind him
effects: All players must Retire 1 hero from their hand or field immediately

name: Execution of the Eunuchs
lore: After assassinating He Jin, Yuan Shao's army storms Luoyang and destroys the ten attendants
effects: Contest for Coalition + Han heroes. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: Betrayal in the North
lore: Yuan Shao takes Jizhuo from Han Fu and betrays Gongsun Zan, Zhao Yun saves him
eventCards: Gongsun Zan and Zhao Yun enter play
effects: Contest for Coalition heroes. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: A broken flagpole
lore: Sun Jian pursues Liu Biao's messenger into a trap and is killed by arrows and boulders
eventCards: Sun Ce and Zhou Yu enter play
effects: Players cannot play cards into Wu this turn

name: An ambush for the Jade Seal
lore: Written inside: By Heaven's mandate: long life and everlasting prosperity
eventCards: Liu Biao and Sun Jian enter play
effects: Players must play at least 1 card in Wu this turn

name: The Flying Swallow
lore: Wang Yun sets up Diaochan to both Dong Zhuo and Lu Bu
effects: Draw 2 extra heroes available for Recruitment

name: The tyrant falls
lore: Dong Zhuo falls into the trap laid by Wang Yun, Li Su and Lu Bu
effects: At the end of this turn, each player receives a free hero to their hand, dealt from the deck that is not Dong Zhuo, and not gold

name: An offer that cannot be refused
lore: Cao Cao, the imperial chancellor, sends his officers to recruit Sima Yi as assistant clerk
effects: Draw 1 extra Title available for purchase

name: A loyalist army from Xiliang
lore: Ma Teng and Han Sui march on the capital to punish the rebel generals
eventCards: Ma Teng and Ma Chao enter play
effects: Draw 1 extra Title available for purchase

name: Revenge for our master
lore: Li Jue and Guo Si invade Chang'an and execute Wang Yun
effects: Contest for Han heroes. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: Usurper for the throne
lore: The prince of Chenliu is installed, while Emperor Shao is deposed
effects: Titles are unavailable for purchase this turn

name: Cao Cao avenges his father
lore: Cao Song is assassinated on Tao Qian's land, Cao Cao seeks revenge
eventCards: Dian Wei and Yu Jin enter play
effects: Players cannot play cards into Wei this turn

name: A savior from outside the walls
lore: Taishi Ci arrives to Beihai just in time to help break the siege with Liu Bei
eventCards: Taishi Ci and Kong Rong enter play
effects: Contest for Advisors between all players. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: An unlikely hero answers the call
lore: Liu Bei signs up to face the Yellow Turbans
effects: Players must play at least 1 card in Shu this turn

name: A stranger speaks up with a plan
lore: Cao Cao speaks at Yuan Shao's meeting to discuss the Eunuchs
effects: Players must play at least 1 card in Wei this turn

name: Lu Bu and Cao Cao clash
lore: Lu Bu attacks Cao Cao while he is sieging Tao Qian, Cao Cao returns home to defend
effects: Players must play at least 1 General. If they cannot, they can only play 2 cards

name: Zhang Fei's drunken rage
lore: Zhang Fei irresponsibly drinks while Liu Bei is away, ending up ceding Xuzhuo to Lu Bu
effects: Players cannot play cards into Shu this turn

name: The emerald eyed sun rises
lore: Sun Ce is assassinated while hunting, young Sun Quan is named as the heir
effects: Players must immediately remove one card from Wu. Discard down to 5 cards if necessary

name: An immortal shot calms the storm
lore: Lu Bu makes a miracle bow shot, sending Ji Ling and Liu Bei peacefully back to their camps
effects: Players may play up to 4 cards this turn

name: Yuan Shu sits upon the dragon throne
lore: Yuan Shu proclaims himself the emperor and fields seven armies
effects: Players can only play max 1 card in each kingdom this turn

name: A head for morale
lore: Cao Cao frames and executes his own officer for stealing grain to raise the morale of his army
effects: Players can only leave 1 card in each kingdom at the end of this turn

name: A horse for a life
lore: Cao Ang, Cao Cao's eldest son, gives his horse to his father to escape, losing his life in the process
effects: Players must immediately remove one card from Wei. Discard down to 5 cards if necessary

name: Three visits to the cottage
lore: Liu Bei visits Zhuge Liang three times before he joins him
effects: Players must start the turn with 3 cards in Shu, either from this or previous turns

name: Battle of Mount Dingjun
lore: A deciding factor in the Hanzhong campaign, Huang Zhong leads Shu to victory
eventCards: Huang Zhong and Xiahou Yuan enter play
effects: Contest for Military. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: Emperor Xian yields the throne
lore: The emperor is persuaded to yield the throne. Cao Pi declines three times before finally ascending
effects: Players must play at least 1 card in Wei this turn

name: Civil war amongst the rebel generals
lore: Guo Si and Li Jue turn on each other, only to lose the Emperor and eventually reconcile
effects: Contest for Piety. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: Empress He faces off Empress Dong
lore: The two empresses vie for power and try to position their respective sons for Emperor
effects: Contest for Influence. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: Cao Cao cleans out the resurgents
lore: Huang Shao and He Yi are defeated by Cao Cao and executed
effects: Turn order is reversed this turn

name: A tiger needs to be tightly bound
lore: Guo Jia concocts a plan to flood Xiapi, Liu Bei and Cao Cao team up against Lu Bu and defeat him
eventCards: Guo Jia and Xiahou Dun enter play
effects: Contest for Shu + Wei heroes. Winner takes this card for 1 bonus point

name: A trap for the regent
lore: The Eunuchs lay a trap for He Jin and assassinate him
effects: Titles are unavailable for purchase this turn
